js.npmDescription: JavaScript Client API for Kurento Media Server

remoteClasses.name: ChromaFilter
remoteClasses.doc:
ChromaFilter interface. This type of :rom:cls:`Filter` makes transparent a colour
range in the top layer, revealing another image behind

params.name: mediaPipeline
params.doc: the :rom:cls:`MediaPipeline` to which the filter belongs

params.name: backgroundImage
params.doc: url of image to be used to replace the detected background

params.name: uri
params.doc: URI where the image is located

methods.name: setBackground
methods.doc: Sets the image to show on the detected chroma surface.

methods.name: unsetBackground
methods.doc: Clears the image used to be shown behind the chroma surface.

properties.name: topRightCornerX
properties.doc: X coordinate of the left upper point of the window

properties.name: topRightCornerY
properties.doc: Y coordinate of the left upper point of the window

properties.name: width
properties.doc: width in pixels of the window

properties.name: height
properties.doc: height in pixels of the window

complexTypes.name: WindowParam
complexTypes.doc:
Parameter representing a window in a video stream.
It is used in command and constructor for media elements.

All units are in pixels, X runs from left to right, Y from top to bottom.
